description: I'm an editor on the Culture desk. Here are five things I've been watching, reading and listening to.
title: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Passing’ and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Passing’ and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? ‘Passing’ and More Emily Brennan �� In Brooklyn, dragging kids to galleries
Netflix
I’m an editor on the Culture desk.
I’m pretty sure my children won’t remember any of the art I’ve taken them to see. But I still feel it’s in them somewhere.
Here are five things I’ve been watching, reading and listening to →
